attributes.action: make the selling of diamonds from conflict sources (blood diamonds) illegal.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Many respectable jewellers only offer diamonds which are guaranteed to be from non-conflict sources. These self policing guarantees are offered by way of a proven supply chain.
We think that there should now be a legal requirement to offer these guarantees, in a similar way to the standards applied to precious metals through the hallmarking act.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
